strapiArticles.title: XSS Hunter
strapiArticles.description: 监控并记录所有 XSS 的记录，包括攻击者IP、受害者IP、受攻击页面等。
strapiArticles.content:
XSS Hunter allows you to find all kinds of cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, including the often-missed blind XSS. The service works by hosting specialized XSS probes which, upon firing, scan the page and send information about the vulnerable page to the XSS Hunter service.
监控并记录所有 XSS 的记录，包括攻击者IP、受害者IP、受攻击页面等。

siteMetadata.title: 收集优质资源
siteMetadata.author: @learn-anything.cn
siteMetadata.description: 追求极简语言，说明事物因果！
